extension_description.message: This extension captures the audio on the current tab and saves the output file on your computer when the capture is complete

extension_action_title.message: Chrome Audio Capture: Open recording interface

popup_startDesc.message: to start capture on current tab

popup_stopDesc.message: to stop capture on current tab

popup_captureLimit.message: Currently the max capture time is 20 minutes due to Chrome memory contraints
